markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Physical Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2251) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness. You increase your proficiency rank in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) and [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) from expert to master.
name: Physical Training
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; Expert in Acrobatics; Expert in Athletics
